properties.name: stripe.secretKey
properties.description: Stripe Secret Key.

properties.name: stripe.publishableKey
properties.description: Stripe Publishable Key.

properties.name: paypal.enabled
properties.description: Set to `true` to enable PayPal (defaults to `false`).

properties.name: paypal.clientId
properties.description: PayPal API client ID.

properties.name: paypal.secret
properties.description: PayPal API secret.

properties.name: paypal.sandbox
properties.description: Set to `true` to use PayPal in sandbox mode (for testing). Default is `false`.

properties.name: paypal.sandboxClientId
properties.description: PayPal API Sandbox client ID.

properties.name: paypal.sandboxSecret
properties.description: PayPal API Sandbox secret.

properties.name: org.displayName
properties.description: Name that is displayed in Stripe Checkout and Apple Pay. You may want to keep this brief as there is not a lot of room in these dialogs.  Defaults to blank.

properties.name: url.mainPage
properties.description: URL for main page of web site (text with `org.siteTitle` links to this). Default is `/`.

properties.name: email.signup.url
properties.description: Page where email signup resides.  Default is `/`.

properties.name: stripe.applyPayEnabled
properties.description: `true` to enable Apple Pay, `false` to disable.  Defaults to `true`.

properties.name: app.collectOccupationEnabled
properties.description: if `true`, collect contributor's occupation. Default is `true`.

properties.name: app.collectOccupationThreshold
properties.description: If contribution amount (in dollars) exceeds this value, occupation is required (if app.collectOccupationEnabled = `true`).

properties.name: app.donationLimit
properties.description: Limit donations to a specified dollar amount (disabled by default by being set to -1)

properties.name: app.googleAnalyticsTrackingId
properties.description: Google Analytics Tracking Id (populating this enables Google Analytics).

properties.name: app.googleSheetId
properties.description: Google Sheet Id to write log to (populating this enables it).

properties.name: mailchimp.apiKey
properties.description: MailChimp API key. If this, and mailchimp.listId is set, e-mails will be stored to a MailChimp list.

properties.name: mailchimp.listId
properties.description: MailChimp List ID. If this, and mailchimp.apiKey is set, e-mails will be stored to a MailChimp list.

properties.name: mailchimp.donationsOnly
properties.description: If true, only store to MailChimp for donations. Default is `true`.

properties.name: mailchimp.allFields
properties.description: If true, store all available fields in MailChimp (ones that are not default to a MailChimp List). Default is `false`.

properties.name: vcs.build.id
properties.description: Version control build id (populated during build, do not override this).

properties.name: app.clientLoggingEnabled
properties.description: Log client messages to server. Default is `true`.
